item.description:
Details

The public is invited to

The Middletown Straw Poll
Saturday 1/26/08 - 7-9 PM
in the Church of the Holy Trinity
381 Main Street, Middletown, CT
For the benefit of the

Connecticut Breast Cancer Coalition/Foundation

Representatives of the campaigns on the ballot in Connecticut
Presidential Primary will advocate for their candidates before
ballots are collected from the audience.
Also in attendance will be special guests and former Middletown
Straw Poll champions Congressman Joe Courtney along with
members of the print, radio and television media.

Entrance is free and open to the public.
A $10 donation(preferably by check) to the Connecticut Breast Cancer
Coalition/Foundation is required to cast a ballot.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be manning a Ron Paul promo table
item.why: Tonight is the Strawpoll open to the general public.It will be a Media event. We need to show those attending that we are not just the internet.
item.name: Middletown Strawpoll Part II
